name: Domino's
comments: Cheap pizzas, good quality, go-to option.
author: pizzalover125

name: Pizza Hut
comments: Inconsistent quality, but good when it's good.
author: pizzalover125

name: Papa John's
comments: Used to be good, but quality has gone down.
author: pizzalover125

name: Little Caesars
comments: Really cheap pizza, but quality is usually bad.
author: pizzalover125

name: Costco Food Court
comments: Cheapest of the cheapest pizzas, but way too greasy and oily.
author: pizzalover125
